de.mrapp.android.adapter.expandablelist.itemstate

Interface ExpandableListItemStateListener<GroupType,ChildType>

  • Type Parameters:
    GroupType - The type of the underlying data of the observed adapter's group items
    ChildType - The type of the underlying data of the observed adapter's child items

    public interface ExpandableListItemStateListener<GroupType,ChildType>
    Defines the interface, all listeners, which should be notified, when the state of a group or child item of a ListAdapter has been changed, must implement.
    Since:
    0.1.0

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onChildStateChanged(ExpandableListAdapter<GroupType,ChildType> adapter, ChildType child, int childIndex, GroupType group, int groupIndex, int state)
      The method, which is invoked, when the state of a child item has been changed.
      void onGroupStateChanged(ExpandableListAdapter<GroupType,ChildType> adapter, GroupType group, int index, int state)
      The method, which is invoked, when the state of a group item has been changed.

    • Method Detail

      • onGroupStateChanged

        void onGroupStateChanged(ExpandableListAdapter<GroupType,ChildType> adapter,
                         GroupType group,
                         int index,
                         int state)
        The method, which is invoked, when the state of a group item has been changed.
        Parameters:
        adapter - The observed adapter as an instance of the type ExpandableListAdapter. The adapter may not be null
        group - The group item, whose state has been changed, as an instance of the generic type GroupType. The group item may not be null
        index - The index of the group item, whose state has been changed, as an Integer value
        state - The new state of the group item, whose state has been changed, as an Integer value

      • onChildStateChanged

        void onChildStateChanged(ExpandableListAdapter<GroupType,ChildType> adapter,
                         ChildType child,
                         int childIndex,
                         GroupType group,
                         int groupIndex,
                         int state)
        The method, which is invoked, when the state of a child item has been changed.
        Parameters:
        adapter - The observed adapter as an instance of the type ExpandableListAdapter. The adapter may not be null
        child - The child item, whose state has been changed, as an instance of the generic type ChildType. The child item may not be null
        childIndex - The index of the child item, whose state has been changed, as an Integer value
        group - The group item, the child, whose state has been changed, belongs to, as an instance of the generic type GroupType. The group item may not be null
        groupIndex - The index of the group item, the child, whose state has been changed, belongs to, as an Integer value
        state - The new state of the child item, whose state has been changed, as an Integer value
